dialogue.introduction: I'm Zuihou. I'm a light carrier, but with proper experience, I'll be able to show you that I perform as good as an aircraft carrier.
dialogue.library_intro: I'm the Shouhou-class light aircraft carrier, Zuihou. Originally planned as a high-speed refueling ship, then a submarine tender, but finally completed as a light aircraft carrier. Though my body is small, I fought bravely to the last day!
dialogue.secretary1: Type 99 bombers, have cute legs, you know?
dialogue.secretary2: The Suisei isn't a bad plane, but the maintenance is pretty harsh.
dialogue.secretary3: Tenzan is... Ah? Ahn♡ Admiral? Could you stop messing with my hangar?nm♡ I mean, quit it.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Coastal patrol and transport fleet escort are both important things aren't they....Hey, admiral, let's go do some work..
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, thanks for all the hard work. Looking after all us light aircraft carriers so well… it makes me happy.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, what? Is it an Air Corps inspection… it's not? Ah, your face is all serious… Eh? A bouquet, eh?! to me!? Ah, ah, what should I do… T-t-thank… you.
dialogue.show_players_score: The war records, when will you look at them? Now... no, it's nothing, any time is fine...
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Light aircraft carrier, Zuihou. Now heading out!
dialogue.equipment1: The newly-developed planes are great, as expected.
dialogue.equipment2: Don't change me back into a high-speed refueling ship because it isn't allowed.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: My armor's thin... It'd be better if they didn't hit me...
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ah, I got pretty beaten up... I wanna go to a hot spring...
dialogue.docking_complete: The damaged ship has finished its repairs.
dialogue.ship_construction: It looks like a new kanmusu has arrived. I wonder if it's a Carrier~?
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet's returned. I hope everybody's okay
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Aircraft carrier, Zuihou. Now heading out! You'll see the true power of the Ozawa Fleet!
dialogue.battle_start: Okay, let's go! Attack wing, launch!
dialogue.air_battle: Even with reduced numbers, we're the best!
dialogue.night_battle: Of course, we're going to pursue!
dialogue.mvp: Zuihou's air corps played a part? Awesome! Even light aircraft carriers can excel if they do their best!
dialogue.minor_damaged1: Kya! Is my flight deck okay?!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: They... got me.... aaa! But, I won't let it be... like Engaño!
dialogue.sunk: All hands....abandon ship... I'm sinking... again... Shouhou? Will I see you... again...
dialogue.new_year_2015: It's the new year! Happy New Year! Umm, would you like to eat my handmade Rolled Omelette?
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Admiral, today is a special day! On such a day and to be eating rolled egg together with you, I'm so happy!
dialogue.christmas_2015: It's Christmas, isn't it? I tried to make Christmas-y tamagoyaki! How is it?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Admiral, in a blink of an eye, it's already the year end. Let's do our best with the spring cleaning. I'll go grab the brooms.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: It's the season for Setsubun. I've already roasted the beans. The grilled egg for the Admiral is also perfect!

hourly.0200: It is now 0200. Aren't you tired?
hourly.0400: The time is... 0400. Isn't it morning?
hourly.0500: The time is now... 0500... It's morning at last.
hourly.0900: The time is now 0900. Just in case, should I ready the defence planes?
hourly.1100: 1100. Have you already eaten your bento?
hourly.1200: It's Noon! Admiral, let's open our bentos! Will you have some of the rolled eggs that I made?
hourly.1500: 1500. I wanna eat sweets... right? Admiral♪
hourly.1900: 1000... Ah...In other words, 7 o'clock!. The sun's set for the day.
hourly.2100: The time is now, 2100. Did you go drinking ashore with the second watch?
hourly.2200: Admiral, it's 2200. Thanks for the hard work today. Eh? You're not tired?
hourly.2300: It is now, 2300. *yawn*... It's early to bed, early to rise, you know?
